WorkItem.ClosedComment: TypeScript isn't supported in continuous deploy yet.
WorkItem.Description:
Hi, I have an mvc application stored in visualstudio.com and published using continuous deploy in an Azure website. I added a few typescript files and checked in.
the build service fails telling:

C:\a\src\telephone house\TelephoneHouse\TelephoneHouse\TelephoneHouse.csproj (3): The imported project "C:\Program Files (x86)\MSBuild\Microsoft\VisualStudio\v11.0\TypeScript\Microsoft.TypeScript.Default.props" was not found. Confirm that the path in the <Import> declaration is correct, and that the file exists on disk.

How can I solve it?
